channel.title: Top 10 Albums on Andy Dyer
channel.description: Recent content in Top 10 Albums on Andy Dyer

item.title: My Top 10 Albums of 2010
item.description: Since I put together my inaugural Top 10 list last year, I may as well make it a tradition. Luckily I had the foresight to keep a running list in Evernote throughout the year, so the tough part was putting them in order. Some may argue about the order of the albums on the list or the exclusion of others. I'd love to hear your opinions. So without any further jibba jabba, here's my Top 10 Albums of 2010 list: Local Natives - Gorilla Manor The harmonies are amazing.
